subject: feat: add risk, debt, epic, semver commit metadata fields
body:
Add four new optional commit metadata fields through the full pipeline:
- Risk (low|medium|high): change risk independent of complexity
- Debt (added|paid|neutral): tech debt trend tracking
- Epic (free-text): group commits to initiatives for effort reporting
- Semver (patch|minor|major): release type classification

Pipeline: extract initializes null, merge-analysis/save-commit validate
when present, aggregate-processed computes breakdowns (overall, monthly,
per-contributor). Dashboard: HealthTab shows Risk Assessment + Debt
Balance + Debt Trend; ProgressTab shows Epic breakdown + Semver doughnut;
SummaryTab shows risk/debt in highlights. All sections conditionally
render â€” existing data without these fields works unchanged.
